availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John D. Scott (Green County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Price Scott and Nancy Scott. Married to Elizabeth Thompson Scott in Green County, Kentucky, on January 10, 1857. Father of Mary B. Scott, Lydia A. Scott, George B. M. Scott, and Cornelius T. Scott. Laborer in Green County in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 132A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 655.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Lower Brush Creek, p. 504A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Marriages, p. 7.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Deaths, p. 415.
